songs.title: The Evolution of Man
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm the super control freak
And I make it look so sweet
But I lost control of myself
I lost control of myself
Never admitting to defeat
Always trying to compete
But I just defeated myself
Just defeated myself

[Pre-Hook]
Oh, oh how the mighty have fallen
Oh, what an end to the story
I never thought I'd see myself so lonely

[Hook]
It's better better, it's better better, it's better better that you didn't know the truth
I'm getting better, I'm getting better, I'm getting better but I wish I could show the proof
I'm better better, it's better better, it's better better that you didn't know the truth
I'm getting better, I'm getting better, I'm living better

[Verse 2]
It all appeared to be so rosy
To everyone that knows me
But I lost control of my health
I lost control of my health
And though you have disowned me
You were the only one who showed me
I'd fallen off of that shelf
And I've just repeated myself

[Pre-Hook]

[Hook]

[Bridge]
I gave up one day, such a slut one day
I was stuck, but hey, I was falling
I'll wake up one day, give a fuck one day
I'm in luck 'cause I hear you calling
Nothing I can say to make you understand
I guess I'll just have to call it the evolution of man

The evolution of man
The evolution of man

It's better better, it's better better, it's better better that you didn't know the truth
I'm getting better, I'm getting better, I'm living better

[Bridge]

The evolution of man
